docs.text: Welcome to geoPythonInfoTree This repo is an informative tool to display and store brief explanations for geospatial python libraries and essential tools of Python. Tables Here you will find lists of some useful sources: Geospatial Python Libraries
docs.title: Welcome to geoPythonInfoTree

docs.text: This repo is an informative tool to display and store brief explanations for geospatial python libraries and essential tools of Python.
docs.title: Welcome to geoPythonInfoTree

docs.text: Here you will find lists of some useful sources: Geospatial Python Libraries
docs.title: Tables

docs.text: List of geospatial libraries in Python This list has been updated at 2023 April. Library Name Data Type Accessible Data Sources Tags API Reference Document altair Vector visualization https://altair-viz.github.io/index.html ArcPy Vector & Raster ArcGIS ArcGIS https://pro.arcgis.com/en/pro-app/latest/arcpy/functions/alphabetical-list-of-arcpy-functions.htm basemap Vector & Raster projection https://matplotlib.org/basemap/users/index.html canopy Vector https://github.com/CanopySimulations/canopy-python cartopy Vector & Raster analysis visualization https://scitools.org.uk/cartopy/docs/latest/reference/index.html Cgal-bindings Vector https://github.com/sciencectn/cgal-bindings DataCube Raster Satellite Imagery satellite imagery https://datacube-core.readthedocs.io/en/latest/api/core-classes/datacube.html descartes Raster image https://pypi.org/project/descartes/ earthpy Vector & Raster plot https://earthpy.readthedocs.io/en/latest/ EoxServer Raster & Vector Earth Observation ESA https://docs.eoxserver.org/en/stable/apidoc/modules.html Fiona Vector read write https://fiona.readthedocs.io/en/stable/ FME Python Vector & Raster FME https://docs.safe.com/fme/html/fmepython/index.html Folium Vector & Raster web map leaflet https://python-visualization.github.io/folium/ GDAL Vector & Raster manipulation https://gdal.org/api/python.html geemap Raster & Vector Google earth engine https://geemap.org/ GeoAlchemy2 Vector SpatialLite PostGIS https://geoalchemy-2.readthedocs.io/en/latest/index.html geographiclib Vector geodesic calculations https://geographiclib.sourceforge.io/1.52/python/index.html geojsonio Vector geojson https://github.com/jwass/geojsonio.py Geomet Vector geojson WKT WKB https://github.com/geomet/geomet Geopandas Vector pandas https://geopandas.org/en/stable/docs.html geoplot Vector visualization https://residentmario.github.io/geoplot/api_reference.html Geopy Vector Nominatim Google geocoder https://github.com/geopy/geopy Geos Vector JTS https://libgeos.org/ geotiff raster tif https://github.com/KipCrossing/geotiff gippy Raster image processing https://gippy.readthedocs.io/en/latest/ Grass Vector & Raster https://grasswiki.osgeo.org/wiki/GRASS_Python_Scripting_Library h3 Vector uber https://h3geo.org/docs/ ipyleaflet Raster web map leaflet https://github.com/jupyter-widgets/ipyleaflet istSOS Vector Sensor http://istsos.org/en/latest/doc/ laszip PointCloud LAS LAZ https://github.com/tmontaigu/laszip-python liblas PointCloud LAS LAZ https://liblas.org/tutorial/python.html libosmium Vector OSM OSM https://github.com/osmcode/pyosmium LİDAR Vector & Raster DEM https://lidar.gishub.org/ mapboxgl-jupyter Vector & Raster mapbox mapbox https://mapbox-mapboxgl-jupyter.readthedocs-hosted.com/en/latest/ mapclassify Raster choropleth classification https://github.com/pysal/mapclassify Mapnik raster Mapnik Boost https://mapnik.org/docs/v2.2.0/api/python/index.html MatPlotLib Vector & Raster visualization https://matplotlib.org/stable/api/index.html mdal Vector mesh https://www.mdal.xyz/api/python_api.html#python-api networkx Vector network analysis https://networkx.org/documentation/stable/reference/index.html Numpy Vector Array https://numpy.org/doc/stable/reference/index.html#reference Opencv-python Raster Vision https://pypi.org/project/opencv-python/ openrouteservice Vector openrouteservice route https://openrouteservice.org/dev/#/api-docs OSMnx Vector osm network analysis https://osmnx.readthedocs.io/en/stable/index.html pandana Vector pandas network http://udst.github.io/pandana/ pdal PointCloud pointcloud https://pdal.io/python.html peartree Vector network https://github.com/kuanb/peartree psycopgr Vector pgrouting https://github.com/herrkaefer/psycopgr pyCWS CSW https://pycsw.org/ pygeoapi Vector OGC Feature API https://docs.pygeoapi.io/en/stable/index.html PyGMT Vector & Raster Blue Marble generic mapping tools https://www.pygmt.org/latest/ pylas PointCloud LAS LAZ https://pylas.readthedocs.io/en/latest/index.html pymap3d Vector ecef coordinate https://geospace-code.github.io/pymap3d/ pyproj Raster & Vector CS https://pyproj4.github.io/pyproj/latest/ pyQGIS Vector & Raster QGIS https://qgis.org/pyqgis/master/ pyroutelib3 Vector osm routing https://github.com/MKuranowski/pyroutelib3 pysal Vector analysis https://pysal.org/libpysal/api.html pyshp Vector shape https://github.com/GeospatialPython/pyshp pyWPS WPS https://pywps.org/ Rasterio Raster https://rasterio.readthedocs.io/en/latest/ Re Vector regular expressions https://docs.python.org/3/library/re.html routingpy Vector google ors here routing https://routingpy.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest RSGISLib Raster remote sensing http://rsgislib.org/rsgislib.html RTree Vector Spatial indexing https://toblerity.org/rtree/ scikit Raster image https://scikit-image.org/docs/stable/api/api.html sentinelhub Raster sentinel landsat modis https://sentinelhub-py.readthedocs.io/en/latest/ Shapely Vector https://shapely.readthedocs.io/en/stable/ urbansim Vector statistical models https://udst.github.io/urbansim/index.html verde Raster gridding https://www.fatiando.org/verde/latest/ whitebox Vector & Raster analysis https://github.com/giswqs/whitebox-python
docs.title: List of geospatial libraries in Python
